description: TeamMaster ( Tournament Editor And Manager Master) is an application designed to facilitate the organization of groups for WCA
tag1: Easily generate score sheets for the first round
tag2: Create blank score sheets and PDF files with the defined groups
tag3: Quickly create credentials, saving time in preparation
tag4: Send emails to competitors directly from the application, facilitating communication and distribution of group information
more-info: Explore all the features that TeamMaster  has to offer and simplify the organization of your WCA tournaments!
no-competitions: There are no tournaments organizated for this user
name: Name
image-title: Image in the center of the canvas recommended(1600x1200 pixels)
